What was the name of the boat that made sure we had hot kahwa and tea available at all times?
utterance.kb: We had an extremely satisfying stay aboard the Wangnoo Sheraton Houseboat. The boat captain Mr. Bilal was very hospitable and made sure all our needs were met. The food provided was tasty and the rooms were fresh, clean and well equipped to battle the weather (room heater, water geyser and electric bed warmers). Highly recommended. Also there was a chacha who made sure we had hot kahwa and tea available at all times.

utterance.nlg: Also there was a chacha who made sure we had hot kahwa and tea available at all times.
